documents.document: In the age of Netflix, I guess i'm a hipster if i'm renting DVDs.
Got my @BayStreetVideo membership. I'm going to watch all their Criterion DVDs.
This is way too real. https://t.co/RCNkeUhf4C
What A Time To Be Alive. #AmericaIsScrewed
@TheJoeLynch Not only is that guy racist, he sucks at actually being racist.
@MrSinsinnatti From now on, if anyone says to me "Your movie sounds like it was written by a 10 year old!", it probably was. ðŸ˜‚
I need to bring back that naivete into my writing, before I learned the "rules".
Found a story that I wrote in the 6th grade that may be the greatest thing i've ever written.
Yo, I can't believe R.S. is a meme now. @TeddyFranchize https://t.co/rZJxQgA0ZB
I can't lie, I'm feeling that ZAYN and Taylor Swift song.
Why are people angry at UBER?
@tristanlowther i need to see this movie.
My next film is called "Save The Last Dab".
@kalenartinian My hip hop stank face is amazing.
Was Donald Trump bullied in high school? It's the only conclusion I have.
I hate to say this, but Brett Ratner is a good example of an action comedy director.
The action scenes in Grimsby conflict with the comedy. You can't go from a fart joke to a Bourne Ultimatum style action scene in seconds.
The Brothers Grimsby is funny, but it may be the most vulgar film i've seen in years.
For some odd reason, depression and other mental illnesses is a taboo in the black community. No need to suffer in silence. #BellLetsTalk
Accidently reads spoilers for Split. I've never been so excited and angry at myself at the same time.
Watching "The Night Of". HBO shows are better than films at this rate.
Trump is abusing his power with these executive orders. A real leader isn't selfish.
Migos "Culture" might be album of the year.
2017 is going to be a great year.
Joe Biden wants to cry! #TrumpInauguration
I've been telling people this, but Blake Lively should get an Oscar nom for "The Shallows". #PCAs2017
You know an award show is a sham when all the winners are sitting in the front row. #peopleschoiceawards
On a steady diet of Ginger Tea for the rest of the week. #sick
Another day, another "I'm not racist, but...." conversation.
@cbcradioq Are you going to have a "Best of 2016" channel on CBC music?

I bet you're going to hear the Moonlight soundtrack in a lot of inspirational Nike commercials.
https://t.co/I5VyeADO6p
@TomiLaffly A Dog's Purpose is a lot darker than I expected.
ABOUT TIME! #Moonlight #GoldenGlobes
The Huppert is strong with this one! #GoldenGlobes
@ThyroneTommy @CybelDP I was drained when he learned how to swim.
Thank You! https://t.co/If1kW93OIN
I need that GIF of Denzel pointing IMMEDIATELY! #GoldenGlobes
Bring back Ricky Gervais. #GoldenGlobes
I knew Damian Chazelle was going to win (he deserves it), but you couldn't even remember Barry Jenkins' name? #GoldenGlobes
They immediately give Atlanta an award after a Moonlight loss to suppress Black Twitter's rage. #GoldenGlobes
The Moonlight disrespect continues......#GoldenGlobes
@desusnice Gotta put AA in the New York Undercover remake.
Can you win a Golden Globe for introducing an award? #ViolaDavis #GoldenGlobes
Elle was my favourite film of 2016. #GoldenGlobes
Gal Gadot is wifey. #GoldenGlobes
Bright Lights looks very Grey Gardens-ish. #GoldenGlobes
Viola forgot to thank Lil Yachty. #GoldenGlobes
I knew Viola Davis was going to win from the TRAILER to Fences. #GoldenGlobes
I see what Questlove is doing. Playing all the original samples of big tracks. #GoldenGlobes
@nsilverberg You should see it. All the cool kids are doing it. #PeerPressureWorks
I'm going to be whistling City Of Stars for the rest of the night. #GoldenGlobes
I knew La La Land was going to win best score, but the Moonlight soundtrack is beautiful. #GoldenGlobes
I really don't know about this new Training Day show.
This OJ Simpson instrumental is pretty lit. #GoldenGlobes
One of my favourite memories is seeing Questlove DJ at a pool party at the Roosevelt Hotel when I was in LA. #GoldenGlobes
@Bren1985 Atlanta won Best New Series. The healing can begin....
THEY'RE PLAYING THE PAPERBOI SONG!!!! #GOLDENGLOBES
Always had a crush on Tracee Ellis Ross back in the "Girlfriends" days. #GoldenGlobes
I'm actually frustrated with Mahershala not winning the Globe. #GoldenGlobes
One award in and this is already the worst Golden Globes.
Congrats to @KeatonTFE and Alex on their lovely wedding! Wedding Szn started early!
I might actually watch this movie because of this poster.... https://t.co/sizbpZmksf
Tonight's film: "Diary Of A Chambermaid" (dir. Luis BuÃ±uel) #Criterion https://t.co/NK9JIuy5Rh
Tonight's films: The Brood (dir David Cronenberg) Broadway Danny Rose (dir. Woody Allen). https://t.co/abxR7XpeTL
Anybody want to go to NY to be an audience member on Maury with me? It's kinda my lifelong dream.
Moonlight 5: Chiron's Revenge #Moonlightsequels
Moonlight: A Star Wars Story
Moonlight 2: Jupiter Ascending
You don't wait for signs of success, you drive towards them.
Worst year ever. #CantWaitTill2018
@desusnice Blowing white ppl minds with this "NaeNae" dance.
@ThatDudeMCFLY Conductor change at Lansdowne ðŸ˜‚
Most of the films I loved this year are appearing on a lot of "Worst Of" lists. I don't know how to feel... :(
Every creative with a dream should watch "Don't Think Twice".
There's ads on Soundcloud now?! ðŸ˜¡

RIP Carrie Fisher. Her last words were "Hope".
Could someone put Paul McCartney, Mick Jagger and Jay-Z in a panic room until 2017?
I would be the worst DJ because all I would play will be the deepest of deep cuts.
@mrleroi Just discovered your amazing podcast. Would love to hear some new episodes.
Guest Hosted the latest episode of #NetflixAndChill . #Nacreviews https://t.co/AtNGZAUHNF
@ThatDudeMCFLY The Beans and Meek Mill interviews made him the hood Larry King. Nick Cannon episode was pretty good.

I'm looking forward to the standalone Star Wars films even more than the Episodes. #RogueOne
@elamin88 Apparently the trailers for Collateral Beauty are super misleading. The plot of this movie is actually dark and disturbing.
@MrSinsinnatti You have to see it to believe it.
@BilgeEbiri Make Electrolytes Great Again.
"Elle" might be my favourite film this year.
@MrSinsinnatti Wow. It really does. Is it cool to sue Kids Help Phone?

I prefer The Conformist anyways.
